Tunable.name: CALORIES_PER_POUND
Tunable.description: Number of calories in 1 pound of fat.

Tunable.name: CONSUMABLE_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: A reference to the Object's consumable commodity.

Tunable.name: FAT_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: A reference to the Sim's fat commodity.

TdescFragTag.name: FAT_GAIN_TEST
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

Tunable.name: FIT_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: A reference to the Sim's fit commodity.

Tunable.name: SIM_WEIGHT_RANGE
Tunable.description: The difference in pounds between Sims with empty and full fat commodities.
